sentences.sContent: I sprang 400 pounds for  her overcoat.
sentences.sCn: 给她买那件大衣，我花了400镑。

sentences.sContent: He placed his cap and overcoat on a chair.
sentences.sContent_eng: He placed his cap and overcoat on a chair.
sentences.sCn: 他把帽子和大衣搁在一张椅子上。

sentences.sContent: She removed all the grease stains from her overcoat.
sentences.sContent_eng: She removed all the grease stains from her overcoat.
sentences.sCn: 她把她大衣上所有油渍都去掉了。
